text: haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) bangkeab aoy krom kruosaear robsa anak brate b tde sa lat ning atthmot champoh vea . yeung min som leaphosakkar pi anak laey . yeung te del chea anak bratan leaphosakkar aoy anak noh . haey lotthophl chongokraoy( thansuokr) ku samreab anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh
